title: Gofmt has no opinion on bracketed switch case scopes
body:
by **aaron.l.france**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Write a switch statement
2. Bracket it's clauses
3. Run gofmt
4. Write another switch statement
5. Don't bracket the clauses
6. Run gofmt
7. Compare output of both

What is the expected output?
I would expect the output to be the same. Both either bracketed cases or both without
the bracketed cases.

What do you see instead?
Different styles allowed in each.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
All


Which operating system are you using?
Irrelevant

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go1.0.2

Please provide any additional information below.
I'm on a horse
